title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy Jumps 9% as It Boosts Mining Capacity Ahead of Bitcoin Halving
description: The company's new machines should ship before the April 2024 Bitcoin halving.

title: Gary Wang faced up to 50 years in prison before plea deal and is still not guaranteed leniency
description:
Gary Wang, co-founder and former CTO of FTX, appeared as a witness for the prosecution in the criminal trial of his fellow co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried on Oct. 6. One fact that emerged during testimony concerns a December 2022 plea deal in which Wang pleaded guilty. In Bloomberg’s account of current testimony, Wang stated that he […]

The post Gary Wang faced up to 50 years in prison before plea deal and is still not guaranteed leniency appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: SBF trial day 4: witness recounts Alamedaâ€™s $65b credit line and alleged unlimited FTX withdrawals
description: Gary Wang told prosecutors that Alameda Research withdrew more value from FTX than the exchange made from fees, owing $20 billion once, while Judge Kaplan reprimanded defense attorneys for repetitive questioning on SBF's trial day 4.
